items.content_html: Tiny Validation is a lightweight, chainable input validation library for Node.js. Validate strings, numbers, emails, and more with ease. Example: validate(input).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).isValid(). Simple API, and perfect for quick validation needs without the bloat. Stay minimal, stay efficient!
items.title: nodebysam/tinyvalidation: Tiny Validation is a lightweight, chainable input validation library for Node.js. Validate strings, numbers, emails, and more with ease. Example: validate(input).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).isValid(). Simple API, and perfect for quick validation needs without the bloat. Stay minimal, stay efficient!

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: YTV Tags is a lightweight web application that extracts and displays keywords from any YouTube video page. By simply entering a YouTube video URL, users can retrieve the embedded meta tags in a user-friendly interface.
items.title: ajayparihar/ytv-tags: YTV Tags is a lightweight web application that extracts and displays keywords from any YouTube video page. By simply entering a YouTube video URL, users can retrieve the embedded meta tags in a user-friendly interface.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you‚Äôre running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
